original: intros. unfold IncreasingSeparationAlgebra, UnitalSeparationAlgebra, ResidualSeparationAlgebra. split. - intros H1 n. destruct (all_increasing n) as [m Inc_n]. exists m. destruct (residue_exists n) as [m' Res_n]. split. + apply Res_n. + apply Inc_n. - intros Hn n. destruct (incr_exists n) as [m [Res_n Inc_m]]. exists m. apply Inc_m.
